## matters.Api.create() method

Opens a matter window with a newly created matter or lead and returns the matter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create(request: CreateMatterRequest): Promise<Matter>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [CreateMatterRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.matters.creatematterrequest.md) | the create request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Matter](./smokeball-client-sdk.matters.matter.md)<!-- -->&gt;

the created matter.

## Example


```
const request: matters.CreateMatterRequest = {
  // Specify the fields here.
};
const matter = await sdk.matters.create(request);
```
